I gathered all the black spirits tainted by Horntail and took them to #p2081006# as #p2081007# requested.

Have you ever seen a monster that is pitch black from head to toe? As Nine Spirit got sealed up by Horntail, the barrier of the Minar Forest got noticeably weakened. As a result, the monsters that reside in this forest have collectively turned violent, but not only that, some of the monsters wound up being heavily influenced by Horntail's evil powers, which in turn blackened their flesh and spirit.

For these monsters, even their spirits have turned black, which in turn blackened their bodies. If I can analyze their black spirits, I may be able to pinpoint Horntail's weaknesses. Will you help me find it?

Please find a way to gather up #b1 black spirit of #o7130501#, #o8140111#, #o8150201#, and #o8150302# each#k and take them to #b#p2081006##k, who is locked up in #b#m240040700##k. She's the only person that can handle these volatile, dangerous black spirits.
Let me know if you change your mind.

You're carrying a dangerous item with you. What? Raul sent you here? If so, then I'll take care of the item. You really did a fantastic job handling this dangerous mission. Anyway, this place is not safe at all, so I suggest you leave this place without being detected by #p2081005# at the entrance of the Cave of Life.
